summaries.title: Customers Bancorp (NYSE:CUBI) and South Atlantic Bancshares (OTCMKTS:SABK) Head-To-Head Survey
summaries.summary: The article compares Customers Bancorp (CUBI) and South Atlantic Bancshares (SABK) as investment options, evaluating factors such as dividends, risk, earnings, institutional ownership, profitability, valuation, and analyst recommendations. It highlights that Customers Bancorp has a significant institutional and insider ownership of 89.3%, suggesting strong investor confidence. The analysis aims to determine which company presents a better investment opportunity.
